<title level="1" right="Trait">[Aasimar](/Traits.aspx?ID=256)</title>

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 266 <sup>2.0</sup>

A creature with this trait has the aasimar versatile heritage. Aasimars are [planar scions](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=81) descended from [celestial](/Traits.aspx?ID=23) beings. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by aasimars.
name: Aasimar
